Content.Text:
<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hrn? What was your name again?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be all right. At least I didn't break a hip or
anything.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, don't worry about it. It was my own fault,
walkin' around the shop like that with my head
in the clouds.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Speaking of... What was it I needed to leave my
shop for again? Hmm...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, right! I was going to go give this to you.
Hold out your hand there.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've used this for many years, but I don't have
much need of it these days, so I thought I'd pass
it on to you.
<PAGE>
I was just on my way up to your farm when we
quite literally ran into each other.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh-ho! I'm glad you like it. Since we're both
here and all, what say I teach you a little about
how to fish?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's be off to the river, then. Follow me.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. Let me show you how to fish.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Not bad, not bad at all!
<PAGE>
If you ever have any questions about how to
fish, just take a look at the book about fishing
on your bookshelf.
<PAGE>
All righty, I'm headed on home, then.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First things first, you've gotta equip your fishing
rod. Can't fish if you don't have it handy, you
know.
<PAGE>
Now, go out to the end of a dock like this and
<BLUE>press the A Button</BLUE> to cast your line.
<PAGE>
Go on, give it a try.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you get a nibble, you'll see an <RED>exclamation
point!</RED> above your head. When that happens
<BLUE>press the A Button</BLUE> repeatedly.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ahaha! Don't worry. It was just your first try. I'll
get rid of that boot for you.
<PAGE>
If you ever have any questions about how to
fish, just take a look at the book about fishing
on your bookshelf.
<PAGE>
All righty, I'm headed on home, then.
